education.subject: Bachelor degree in Information Technology Engineering
education.university: Faculty of Information Technology Engineering, AB University
education.description: The Faculty of Informatics Engineering at the University of AB was established in 2000, before the new plan it has three sections: software engineering, information systems, computer networks and artificial intelligence and natural language. According to the old plan, the duration of study is 5 years; including three years of basic sciences then two years where the student specializes in one of the previous terms of reference. The first class graduated in 2003.

experience.companyDescription: Rat, Inc. is a Japanese electronic commerce and online retailing company based in Tokyo.
tasks: Working with other senior engineers to decide the design of a new system
Developing user interfaces and being a close to UX team
Technologies Stack: Javascript, React.js, Typescript, Express.js and MongoDB.

experience.companyDescription: Tbs is a software company that develops accounting and e-government systems.
